title: Noise on the Wires Jam Session
abstract: Synthesizer Jam Session. Bring a piece of your favorite analog gear (synth, drum machine, sampler, modular) and let’s jam together.
description:
We will bring amp, mixer and provide a central MIDI clock. Bring a piece of your favorite analog gear (synths, drum machines, modular) and let’s jam together. Please bring your own midi and audio cable. Musicians, gear geeks as well as electronic music lovers are welcome!

If you are a musician and know about your participation beforehand then please drop me a line either via https://www.meetup.com/synth-jams-munich/ or https://www.instagram.com/deergardenjams/.

Otherwise be spontaneous and just drop by.

persons.biography: Synth enthusiast and hobby musician. Part of Deergaden project: https://www.instagram.com/deergardenjams/
